A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie definitely had its flaws (Finn and Rose storyline)\, but also had some amazing scenes and epic shots. The storyline\, especially towards the end of the movie was very enjoyable. I see that the audience score is really low\, but everyone I've talked to enjoyed it\, and perhaps the people who hated it are just so passionate that they were more likely to leave reviews. Anyhow\, a solid installment in the Star Wars franchise.
